bio: I represent the Pocket Network Foundation: credibly neutral stewards of Pocket Network and the DAOs goal of unstoppable open data.
contributionDescription:
Pocket provides RPCs for Optimism developers via its decentralised node network.  Our noderunners have provided over 11.5 Billion relays to Optimism since June 2022.  
We have started integrating OP Stack chains by supporting BASE (136 Million relays since August 2023). 
We also provide a dedicated public endpoint for Optimism free of charge to end users.

For developers, we provide a generous free tier up to 100,000 relays per day.  Our decentralised network enjoys near perfect uptime.

contributionLinks.description: Block explorer and analytics platform for Pocket Blockchain

impactDescription:
- Enabling developers to build applications on top of Optimism and make 11.5 Billion calls to the Optimism blockchain
- Providing end-users a public endpoint for Optimism that enjoys near perfect uptime and provides a decentralised RPC connection for their wallet.

fundingSources.description: RPG funding to the Pocket core team for historical support of public endpoints

pwCategorySuggestions: Tokenization Platforms, Blockchain Infrastructure, Developer Ecosystem, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Web3 Community Platform
